title: MacBook pro A1398 early 2013 display flickering
message:
Please find the attached video link, I don't know why it is flickering intermediately. Did anybody faced this issue ? 
I have checked with external screen but I can't see flickering in the external monitor but the internal one is flickering.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-VXLh9OyqQYgah3ML84BtnXS_hV_sVSR[/URL]

title: MacBook pro A1398 early 2013 display flickering
message: Forgot to tell, I was changed the battery, did I screwed the display because of pressure on it?

title: MacBook pro A1398 early 2013 display flickering
message:
Looks like screen problem.
You should test with known good one.

title: MacBook pro A1398 early 2013 display flickering
message: It is not happening always, it's happening when I keep it long time in cupboard. Something related to temperature I think. Will display performance impact depends on temperature? Yesterday whole night laptop was outside and it was ON. Today I don't see this flickering anymore
